description.displayText: I’ve known Marina (Edda) R for 10 years. She is a close family friend and I trust her entirely to take care of children, as if they were her own family. You will be very happy to have her help, and so will your children. She is very patient, very attentive and loves encouraging kids, if they choose, to try speaking Spanish. Children under her care in the past have loved have this aspect of having Marina in their lives.
